title: Little Happier: On “Game of Thrones,” Tywin Lannister Has the Right Thing to Say in a Difficult Situation.
description:
I’m always looking for good examples of people finding the right words, and I was very struck by this example from a crucial scene from the TV show “Game of Thrones.”
Get tickets for our last live podcast events of 2019 in Atlanta, Charlotte and Brooklyn here:
https://gretchenrubin.com/events
Happier with Gretchen Rubin is part of ‘The Onward Project,’ a family of podcasts brought together by Gretchen Rubin—all about how to make your life better. Check out the other Onward Project podcasts—Do The Thing, Side Hustle School, and Happier in Hollywood. If you liked this episode, please subscribe, leave a review, and tell your friends!
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
